# completionDelay

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s completion delay to a given delay.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var completionDelay: TimeInterval { get set }
```

## Configuring the Completion Delay

- **defaultCompletionDelay**: Returns the default completion delay.
title: completionDelay
